Author: phil
Content: so at a first glance, the list of features seems to mostly be about better support and gmail features.

Author: brett
Content: Bare bones API-like stuff could go a long way. Add a url parameter to the submit page that prefills the url field and anyone can create a bookmarklet for submitting. Add a status page that takes a url and returns whether or not it is in the system, its current rating and the id to pass in for modding and someone's on their way to a low rent firefox extension.

Author: papersmith
Content: Damn it Paul, you beat me to it.  I slapped together a reddit clone last summer in reaction to its diluting startup content, but I went on to travel for a month and have been procrastinating from finishing it up ever since.  Nevertheless, I really appreciate that you are opening this to public.
